channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 inmates dead, corrections officer, others injured in Georgia prison fight: Police
item.description: Police in Georgia say three inmates were killed and a corrections officer and several other inmates were injured when a fight broke out at a state pri...

item.title: Police consider assault charge after U-Haul drives into Iran protest in Los Angeles
item.description: Police say a man suspected of driving a U-Haul truck down a street filled with demonstrators supporting the Iranian people is in police custody and fa...

item.title: Monkeys are on the loose in St. Louis, and AI images are complicating the search
item.description: Multiple monkeys are on the loose in St. Louis

item.title: Stocks of credit card companies slump as Wall Street overall drifts in mixed trading
item.description: Stocks of credit card companies are dropping after President Donald Trump threatened moves that could eat into their profits

item.title: The Trevor Project receives $45M from MacKenzie Scott after difficult years and federal funding cuts
item.description: The nonprofit Trevor Project received a $45 million gift from billionaire MacKenzie Scott at the end of 2025
